title: Can Nunu please be Amumu's friend? Please???
body:
Riot pls! Let Nunu and Willump somehow lift Amumu's curse. Willump will cure Amumu's depression and Nunu can have a human (or yordle, i can't remember) friend. I don't know how or why they would meet but it needs to happen. Amumu would be all like "Do you wanna be my friend?" then Nunu would be all like "That would be AWESOME!" Willump could try to stop him because he can sense magic but Nunu could just break the curse with friendship or something... I'm not a story writer but I really think there's potential there. Just dont let Nunu contract the curse or something. that would be sad.

Ps: Can we get a new Nunu & Willump emote for the boards? the other ones give me the creeps, i'd love too see some cute ones.

replies.body:
Confirmed - Nunu, Amumu and Lulu all hang out.

Also, Swain brings the pain to Kayn and Vayne, in lane or on the Dalamor Plain.
but who brings the rain?...... Actually that's a good question. Where is our Storm based champ? GET ON THAT, SCATHLOCKE!
Kayn can one shot Swain btw :D
But mainly on the Plain?

What you said: "Can Nunu please be Amumu's friend? Please???"
What i read: "Can Nunu please die? Please???"
You don't NEED to touch your friends.
GIMMIE A HIGH FIVE BRO!!!!

Yeah lol. 
But pen pals?
Maybe that works
As heart touching as that would be, not even Kindred wants to be his friend.  The manufestation of death doesn't want to friend, let's let that sink in.
Most likely because Amumu unwilly kills everything.
how in the hell can you literally kill death tho
by killing it till it's dead.
how do you kill something that has no life...?

> [{quoted}](name=Hextech OwI,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=prkuA7wU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-08-30T01:05:07.516+0000)
>
> Most likely because Amumu unwilly kills everything.

I like to think Kindred doesn't want to be Amumu's friend, simply because Kindred doesn't like people that can't die. Since you know, their only reason for existence is killing people as the "grim reaper".
Runeterra daycare{{champion:20}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:150}}

Make them a star guardian team.

{{champion:201}}  can be the teacher.
maybe add in zoe?

Zoe is a teenager.

Theyre children.
No way. Amumu needs a friend made of Petricite. Because he's a walking curse, and curses are from magic!!!

So, Galio?
{{champion:3}}

> {{champion:3}}

Galio looks more like the jock that bullies Amumu in school.

I'm sorry, I was forced to downvote bc you used amumu and "his friend" in the same sentence.
{{champion:32}} 5ever alone
I mean Xayah wants to take him home, but she'll just die from the curse. Annie used to friends with him in the old lore. Maybe Poppy can because Demacian armor.
